translations: 笨蛋；黏糊糊的东西；无礼貌的人

sentences.sentence: the exposed top end stays clean while the root-ish tail end catches the hair and goop.
sentences.translation: 你看，暴露在外的上表面一直很干净而下面的像根一样的尾巴就会把头发截留下来了。

sentences.sentence: Warly no longer considers Wet Goop "Delectable", even if it is the a fresh new experience for him.
sentences.translation: 也因此不再把湿糊的“美味”，即使它是一个新鲜的经验给他。

sentences.sentence: As well as nourishing us all with the fountain of wisdom spewed forth in her Goop newsletter, Gwyneth Paltrow is also extremely talented.
sentences.translation: 除了在Goop newsletter上像喷泉一样的喷发出智慧来滋养我们外，格温妮丝•帕特洛还是极其有天份的。
